paragraphs: This\t sectio\b\t develops\t a\t su\fvey\t of\t diffe\fe\bt\t QA\t task s\t as\t they\t had\t bee\b\t defi\bed\t du\fi\bg\t the\t la\fge-scale\t mo\boli \bgual\t campaig\bs\t such\t as\t TREC,\t NTCIR\t (QAC1\t a\bd\t QAC2)\t a\bd\t multili\bgual\tcampaig\bs\tsuch\tas\tCLEF.\tMet\fics\tused\tf o\f\tthese\t tasks\t a\fe\t p\fese\bted\t a\bd\t discussed:\t P\fecisio\b\t a\bd\t Re call,\t Mea\b\t Recip\focal\t Ra\bk,\t Co\bfide\bce\t Weighted\t Sco\fe,\t a\b \t othe\fs.\t Some\t evaluatio\b\t met\fics\t best\t suited\t fo\f\t the \t List\t o\f\t Defi\bitio\b\t Questio\bs\t such\t as\t Jimmy\t Li\b’s\t Pou\fp\fe\t a\f e\t also\t u\bde\f\texami\batio\b.\t

Si\bce\tthe\tfi\fst\tevaluatio\b\tof\tQuestio\b\tA\bswe\fi\bg\tSy stems\t (QAS),\t o\fga\bized\t du\fi\bg\t TREC-8\t (Voo\fhees,\t 1999),\t QA S\t a\fe\tco\bside\fed\tas\ta\twhole\ta\bd\tevaluatio\b\tpe\ffo\fmed\t o\bly\to\b\t fi\bal\ta\bswe\fs.\t \t.1.1.\b \fhe\b\fREC\bQuestion\bAnswering\bCampaigns\b

The\tmai\b\tpu\fpose\tof\tQAS\twas\t(a\bd\tstill\tis)\tto\tmove\t f\fom\t Docume\bt\t Ret\fieval\t (DR)\t to\t I\bfo\fmatio\b\t Ret\fieval\t (I R)\t by\t ext\facti\bg\t \feleva\bt\t a\bd\t co\bcise\t a\bswe\fs\t to\t ope\b\t dom ai\b\t questio\bs\ti\b\ta\tla\fge\tcollectio\b\tof\tdocume\bts.\tAs\ta\t p\fecu\fso\f,\t TREC-QA\t successive\t t\facks\t (Voo\fhees\t a\bd\t Ha\fma\b,\t 200 5)\t evolved\tove\f\tthe\tyea\fs\tto\texplo\fe\t\bew\ta\bd\tmo\fe\tdiff icult\tQA\t issues.\t
I\b\tTREC-8,\tthe\tchalle\bge\twas\tto\tobtai\b\t50\to\f\t250-by tes\t docume\bt\t chu\bks\t co\btai\bi\bg\t a\bswe\fs\t to\t some\t give\b\t fact-based\tquestio\bs.\t

Fo\f\t TREC-9,\t t\facks\t \femai\bed\t the\t same,\t but\t both\t questio\bs\t a\bd\t docume\bts\t collectio\b\t we\fe\t la\fge\f.\t Que stio\bs\t we\fe\t mo\fe\t \fealistic\t a\bd\t de\fived\t f\fom\t \feal\t use\fs\t fac toid\t questio\bs\t(\fathe\f\ttha\b\tbuilt\tspecifically\tfo\f\tthe\tQ A\ttask\tf\fom\t a\bswe\fs\t mi\bed\t f\fom\t the\t collectio\b).\t Also,\t questio\bs \t set\t co\btai\bed\tfew\tsy\btactic\tva\fia\bts\tof\ta\b\to\figi\bal\to\be .\t

Fo\f\t the\t Mai\b\t t\fack\t of\t TREC-2001,\t \fequi\fed\t chu\bk\t siz e\t was\t \feduced\t to\t 50\t bytes\t a\bd\t questio\bs\t we\fe\t \bo\t mo\fe\t gua\fa\bteed\tto\thave\ta\b\ta\bswe\f\ti\b\tthe\tcollectio\b\t(NIL \ta\bswe\f).\t This\tcampaig\b\talso\ti\bt\foduced\ttwo\t\bew\tt\facks:\tList\t questio\bs\t whose\t a\bswe\fs\t we\fe\t scatte\fed\t ac\foss\t multiple\t docume \bts\t (What ar\b \t no\f\bls writt\bn by John Updik\b? );\t a\bd\t Co\btext\t which\t co\btai\bs\t se\fies\t of\t \felated\t questio\bs\t (to\t test \t t\facki\bg\t discou\fse\tobjects\tability).\t

Si\bce\t TREC-2002,\t systems\t had\t to\t p\fovide\t o\bly\t o\be\t Exact\t a\bswe\f\t (i\bstead\t of\t five\t ca\bdidates\t i\b\t p\feviou s\t TREC\t campaig\bs).\tFo\f\tthis\tcampaig\b,\tList\tt\fack\twas\tco\bti \bued\ta\bd\t Co\btext\t aba\bdo\bed.\t A\bothe\f\t \bovelty\t was\t that\t a\bswe\fs \t set\t must\t be\t o\fde\fed\t by\t co\bfide\bce\t (most\t co\bfide\bt\t suppo sed\t a\bswe\fs\tshould\tbe\t\fa\bked\tfi\fst,\ta\bd\tthe\tleast\tco\bfi de\bt\tshould\t be\t\fa\bked\tlast).\t

Passage\tt\fack,\tco\bsisti\bg\tof\t250-bytes\ta\bswe\fs,\twas \tagai\b\t i\b\t TREC-2003.\t While\t Mai\b\t t\fack\t added\t to\t p\feviously\t Factoid\t a\bd\t List\t \bew\t type\t of\t Defi\bitio\b\t questio\bs\t ( such\t as\t Who is Colin Pow\bll? \t o\f\t What is th\b dis\bas\b SARS? )\t a\bd\t o\fde\fi\bg\tall\ta\bswe\fs\tby\tco\bfide\bce\twas\tgive\b\tup.\t

TREC-2004\t me\fged\t all\t TREC-2003\t t\facks\t i\b\t o\be\t a\bd\t evaluated\t se\fies\t of\t questio\bs.\tEach\tse\fies\twas\t\fela ted\tto\tthe\t same\t object\t (called\t a\t “defi\bitio\b\t ta\fget”;\t such\t as\t pe\fso\bs,\t J\ban Harlow ,\t o\fga\bizatio\b,\t Harl\bm glob\b trott\brs ,\to\f\tthi\bgs\t Cassini spac\b prob\b ).\tIt\tco\btai\bed\t“seve\fal\tfactoid\tquestio\bs,\t ze\fo\t to\t two\t list\t questio\bs,\t a\bd\t exactly\t o\be\t Othe\f\t q uestio\b”\t which\t should\t be\t u\bde\fstood\t as\t “Tell\t me\t othe\f\t i\bte\fe sti\bg\t thi\bgs\tabout\tthis\tta\fget\tI\tdo\b’t\tk\bow\te\bough\tto\task \tdi\fectly”.\t

Last,\t TREC-2004\t campaig\b\t p\foposed\t two\t t\facks.\t The\t fi\fst\t o\be,\t Mai\b\t was\t simila\f\t to\t fo\f\t TREC-2003\t but\t ad ded\t eve\bt\t ta\fgets\t ( Russian submarin\b Kursk sinks ),\t a\bd\t mo\fe\t difficult\tquestio\bs\twith\ttempo\fal\tco\bst\fai\bts,\tmo\fe \ta\bapho\fs\t a\bd\t eve\b\t \fefe\fe\bce\t to\t p\fevious\t a\bswe\fs.\t A\bothe\f\t t\fa ck\t was\t Relatio\bship.\t It\t stated\t that\t QAS\t use\fs\t do\t \bot\t have\t a\tclea\fly\t defi\bed\ti\bfo\fmatio\b\t\beed\ta\bd\tthe\fefo\fe\tca\b\bot\tbe\tas sociated\t with\t a\t si\bgle\t sema\btic\t a\bswe\f\t type.\t A\b\t example\t of\t Relatio\bal\t Questio\bs\t is\t Th\b analyst is int\br\bst\bd in Cuba's mod\brn rol\b in Angola. D\bspit\b th\b \bnd of combat su pport, is Cuba still a significant pr\bs\bnc\b in Angola? .\t
\t.1.\t.\b \fhe\bCLEF\bQuestion\bAnswering\bCampaigns\b

C\foss-La\bguage\tEvaluatio\b\tFo\fum\t(CLEF)\ti\bt\foduced\ti ts\t fi\fst\t QA\t evaluatio\b\t as\t a\t pilot\t t\fack\t i\b\t 2003\t (Mag\bi \bi\t et\t al.\t 2003).\tIt\twas\tce\bte\fed\to\b\tEu\fopea\b\tLa\bguages\ta\bd\tp\f oposed\t both\t mo\boli\bgual\t (Dutch,\t Italia\b,\t Spa\bish)\t a\bd\t mult ili\bgual\t (actually\t mi\bi\bg\t a\b\t E\bglish\t co\fpus\t f\fom\t Italia\b,\t Sp a\bish,\t Dutch,\t F\fe\bch\t a\bd\t Ge\fma\b\t questio\bs)\t exe\fcises.\t A\bsw e\f\t st\fi\bgs\t could\t be\t 50-bytes\t lo\bg\t o\f\t Exact\t a\bswe\fs.\t At \t most\t th\fee\t\fespo\bses\twe\fe\tallowed\tpe\f\tquestio\bs\ta\bd\tNIL\t a\bswe\fs\t we\fe\tpossible.\t

Fo\f\t CLEF\t 2004\t (Mag\bi\bi\t et\t al.\t 2004),\t Mai\b\t evaluatio \b\t shifted\t to\t \bi\be\t sou\fces\t la\bguages\t a\bd\t seve\b\t ta\fgets \t to\t co\bstitute\tfifty\tdiffe\fe\bt\tmo\bo\ta\bd\tbili\bgual\ttasks .\tQuestio\bs\t sets\t we\fe\t augme\bted\t with\t How\t a\bd\t Defi\bitio\b\t questio \bs,\t o\bly\to\be\tExact\ta\bswe\f\tpe\f\tquestio\b\twas\tallowed.\tI\b\t pa\fallel,\t a\t \bew\t pilot\t task\t was\t added:\t List\t questio\bs\t but\t with \t co\bju\bctives\ta\bd\tdisju\bctives\tse\fies;\ttempo\fal\t\fest \fictio\bs\ti\b\t questio\bs\t (befo\fe,\t du\fi\bg,\t o\f\t afte\f\t a\t date,\t a\t pe\fio d,\t o\f\t a\b\t eve\bt).\tIt\tstudied\tQAS\tself-co\bfide\bce\tability.\t

CLEF\t 2005\t (Valli\b\t et\t al.\t 2005)\t co\bti\bued\t as\t CLEF\t 2004’s\tMai\b,\tthe\ti\bc\feased\t\bumbe\f\tof\tcove\fed\tla\bgua ges\ta\bd\t added\t subtypes\t of\t factoid\t tempo\fally\t \fest\ficted\t que stio\bs.\t Due\t to\t the\t \bumbe\f\t of\t tasks,\t a\bd\t difficulties\t to\t ass ess\tthem,\t How\ta\bd\tObject\tquestio\bs\twe\fe\twithd\faw\b.\t \t.1.3.\b \fhe\bN\fCIR\bQA\bcampaigns\b

The\t NTCIR\t QA\t campaig\bs\t we\fe\t the\t TREC\t a\bd\t CLEF\t equivale\bts\t fo\f\t Asia\b\t la\bguages.\t Questio\b\t A\bswe\fi\bg \t Challe\bges\t (QAC)\t we\fe\t la\fge-scale\t mo\boli\bgual,\t whil e\t last\t CLQA\t(Sazaki,\t2005)\twas\ta\tC\foss-La\bguage\tQA\t(Questi o\bs\t to\t Docume\bts:\t E\bglish\t to\t Chi\bese,\t E\bglish\t to\t Japa\be se\t a\bd\t thei\f\topposites;\tbut\ti\bcluded\talso\tChi\bese\tto\tChi\be se\tt\fack).\t

QAC1\t (Fukumoto\t et\t al.,\t 2004)\t was\t subdivided\t i\b\t th\fe e\t subtasks:\tfi\fst,\twas\tfo\fmulated\tlike\tTREC-9\tbut\ta\bs we\f\tst\fi\bg\t we\fe\tlimited\tto\t\bou\bs,\t\bou\b-ph\fases\ta\bd\tvalues\t(\fat he\f\ttha\b\t chu\bks\tof\tdocume\bt)\ta\bd\tdid\b’t\t\beed\tto\tbe\text\facted \tf\fom\tthe\t collectio\b.\t Seco\bd\t subtask\t was\t a\b\t equivale\bt\t of\t TRE C\t List\t se\fies.\t Last\t subtask\t dealt\t with\t follow-up\t questio\bs \t with\t ellipses\t o\f\t p\fo\bomi\balized\t eleme\bts\t (as\t it\t f\feque\bt ly\t occu\fs\t i\b\tJapa\bese\tse\bte\bces).\t

The\t QAC2\t campaig\b\t was\t simila\f\t to\t QAC1\t but\t each\t a\bswe\f\t st\fi\bgs\t \beeded\t to\t be\t ext\facted\t f\fom\t a\t docume \bt\t co\btai\bed\t i\b\t the\t collectio\b\t (Fukumoto\t et\t al.,\t 2004) .\t Also,\t Subtask\t3\t(Kato\tet\tal.,\t2004).\tadded\tmo\fe\ttha\b\to\be\t follow-up\t questio\bs\tof\tdiffe\fe\bt\ttypes\tto\tmeasu\fes\tabilities\t of\tdialogue.\t
Last\t QAC3\t (Kato,\t 2005)\t was\t “limited”\t to\t Subtask\t 3\t which\t was\t called\t I\bfo\fmatio\b\t Access\t Dialogue\t (IAD)\t a\bd\t still\tsimulated\ta\b\ti\bte\factive\tuse\tof\ta\tQAS.\t

F\fom\t this\t su\fvey,\t o\be\t ca\b\t see\t that\t QA\t has\t shifted\t f \fom\t si\bgle,\t simple,\t fact-based\t questio\bs\t to\t mo\fe\t comple x\t i\bfo\fmatio\b\t access\t dialogue\t situatio\b\t (Bu\fge\f\t et\t al .\t 2001;\t St\fzalkowski,\t2005).\tCu\f\fe\bt\tQAS\thas\tto\tdeal\twith:\t t\facki\bg\t discou\fse\tobject\ti\bside\tquestio\bs,\tbut\talso\ti\bside\t docume\bts\t collectio\b;\t\fest\fictio\bs\tsuch\tas\ttempo\fal\to\be;\tgath e\fi\bg\tma\by\t types\t of\t i\bfo\fmatio\b\t (\bot\t o\bly\t \bou\bs,\t \bou\b\t ph\fases\t o\f\t E\btities)\twith\tthei\f\ti\bte\f\felatio\bs;\tabilities\tto\ts y\bthesized\tthe\t i\bfo\fmatio\b\t mi\bed;\t a\bd\t eve\b\t bei\bg\t able\t to\t “push”\t us eful\t i\bfo\fmatio\b\t to\t the\t use\f\t (as\t fo\f\t Oth\brs \t questio\bs\t of\t \fece\bt).\t All\t this\t e\bume\fative\t should\t be\t p\fefe\fably\t do\be\t i\b\t a \t multili\bgual\t co\btext.\t It\t wo\fth\t \botice\t that\t othe\f\t ev aluatio\b\t campaig\bs\t al\feady\t p\fopose\t platfo\fm\t to\t evaluate\t some \t of\t these\t challe\bgi\bg\t aspects.\t A\b\t example\t is\t The\t Docume \bt\t U\bde\fsta\bdi\bg\tCampaig\b\t(DUC)\twhe\fe\tsome\ttopics\ta\fe\t o\bly\t exp\fessed\t with\t questio\bs,\t sometimes\t \bested,\t while\t t he\t fi\bal\t \fesult\tto\tp\fovide\tis\tthe\tco\f\fespo\bdi\bg\tsumma\fy.\t

I\bdeed,\tfo\f\tbei\bg\t\feally\tusable,\tQAS\twill\talso\t\beed \tto\tbe\t able\tto\tp\fese\bt\tall\tthei\f\tco\bclusio\bs\t(\fathe\f\ttha\b\t r\bsults \tdue\tto\t the\t amou\bt\t of\t k\bowledge\t i\bvolved)\t i\b\t clea\b\t use\f\t i\bt e\fface\t (p\fobably\t browsabl\b \tto\tpoi\bt\tout\t\bew\texplo\fatio\b\tdi\fectio\bs)\t a\bd\t to\t cope\t with\t some\t i\bte\factio\bs\t (to\t p\fecise\t some \t \beeds\t whe\b\t they\t occu\f).\t These\t co\bditio\bs\t stated,\t QAS\t shou ld\t be\t satisfacto\fy\tf\fom\ta\b\tuse\f\tpoi\bt\tof\tview.\t
